channel.title: How do i change lvl126 to 138cb
channel.description:
hi can anyone help me
how to change combat 126 to 138 plz help me
greetz lord inie

item.title: How do i change lvl126 to 138cb
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“SandScape, post:4, topic:258607”]go into client.java and then search for

code:
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 99;

change the 99 to the skill level you want it to be changed to.
remeber to change both. and you have your combat lvl changed.

save it then compile it and there.[/quote]
But that also changes the max skill levels. Higher then 99 fails.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change lvl126 to 138cb

item.title: How do i change lvl126 to 138cb
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

go into client.java and then search for

code:
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 99;

change the 99 to the skill level you want it to be changed to.
remeber to change both. and you have your combat lvl changed.

save it then compile it and there.
